[h1]Вступление:[/h1]
Хороший хорор,со своей задумкой.Вы можете выбрать за кого играть за маньяка или выживших.За выживших надо починить генераторы которые можно найти в различных местах,на карте.За маньяка нужно убить выживших и не дать им сбежать
[h1]Графика:[/h1]
Прикольная графика ,со своей изюминкой.
[h1]Цена:[/h1]
Не такая и большая.
[h1]Итоги:[/h1]
Игра хорошая,собрала множество фанатов.
[h1]Оценка:[/h1]
[b]10 из 10[/b]

Dead by Daylight - это...
- Когда маньяк с крутыми перками - дно, а выжившим можно.
- Когда снял выжившего с крюка и занял его место.
- Когда каждый думает, что его мнение самое правильное.
- Когда в чатике ты узнаешь новые слова.
- Когда можно поднимать одной левой двух выживших.
- Когда Новый Год в игре ощущается больше, чем в твоей хате.
- Когда ты наиграл 500 часов и понял, что не знал ничего.
- Когда посмотрел пару роликов у стримеров и стал на 1000 часов старше.
- Когда разрабы купаются в репортах как Скрудж в своем золоте.
- Когда ты плохой маньяк в любой ситуации.
- Когда ждешь выход нового длс больше, чем свой День Рождения.
- Когда ты настолько упертый выживший, как и маньяк, что вы оба готовы часами стоять у люка и ждать, чтобы тот сделал первый шаг.
- Когда игру проходишь даже во сне.
- Когда у двух выживших рамсы между собой, а маньяк мешает.
- Когда сломан комп и ты смотришь игру на твиче.
- Когда все изменили с другой игрой, но через месяц вернулись обратно.
- Когда твои напарники ливают через минуту.
- Когда медсестра и доктор взбунтовались работать за 10 тысяч.
- Когда не спишь до 3.30, зная что с утра в школу/на работу.
- Когда только начал катку, а тебе надо идти в магаз
I have mixed feelings about the game but overall it's good.

I am so amazed that a game this buggy can still some times be able to be played. I love Dead by Daylight I love the idea and the game play. But its gottan to the point were you can't even play it infinite loading screens people on your team will ether disconnect the second theyre hit/hooked or wont even load in. Me and 3 of my friends have experinced a glitch that doesnt crash the game, no it crashes the wifi on your computer and the game. I'm really sad I loved this game and bought most the DLCs and even bought the game for a friend. There is no reason to play anymore you will spend 80% of your time in a menu looking for a match or in a loading screen that doesnt load. Oh and icing on the cake is any items offerings or add ons you bring in will be lost. So you can't play the game and when you can you will have thrown away a majority of your items or you'll stop even trying to bring them in all together. 3/10

Great, Fun, Non Toxic, and the greatest factor, highly addictive. If you are a team player that enjoys playing with friends Survivor is the way to go, if you perfer solo gameplay and feeling like a powerfull presenece then Killer is for you. The Community is great and both roles seem Somewhat powerfull in certin situations. In short the game is Fun, a great use of time for climbing, and playing with friends will be the best expirence you will have in gaming.
best online horor game ever. So fun

Listen, i've been playing DBD since 2018, ive watched it become a much better game after 2019's spirit meta dumpsterfire, and they improved vaulting, loops, and made many things more bearable for both sides..


This new update is... gamebreaking. The new ui is fine, everyone will get used to it, (the bloodpoint counter in the top right is way too small though).

The animations, look fine, look good, but THE HITBOXES. Dbd has always had an issue with hitboxes. They got them to a state where the hits were much less unfair and that was as good as we got. 

With these new animations the hitboxes have been completely screwed up. About every single time i've been hit was an unfair hit. 

I would say just wait for this to hopefully get fixed, but Behavior does this shit constantly. They release broken shit and then everyone whines, but this time its unplayable. These hitboxes are straight up unplayable and if they dont fix it soon theres more bad reviews to come.


Update: they fixed animations, ui looks worse than before imo but idc lol

Plutôt équilibré, il y'en aura toujours pour rager et dire que c'est tout pour le tueur et rien pour les survivants (ou inversement), alors que si les gens ont un minimum d'expérience tout peut bien se passer pour les deux camps.

Cela étant dis je dois reconnaitre que pour réellement apprécier ce jeu il faut un minimum d'experience, car si vous vous mettez à courir à la moindre approche du tueur, ou que vous perdez le survivant au moins tournant, vous risquez de ne pas faire long feu (que ce soit en tueur ou en survivant), et dans ce cas ce jeu peut vite devenir frustrant. Donc les débutants si vous voulez un conseil, soyez patients, regarder les autres survivants jouer si vous êtes morts, faites du gameplay des deux côtés (pour pouvoir correctement jouer tueur, il faut comprendre comment on joue survivant, et du coup pouvoir les anticiper).

Le seul petit malus est au niveau de la communauté, et malheureusement on ne peut pas en vouloir aux développeurs, car c'est malheureusement le cas (plus ou moins) dans tous les jeux multi.

Côté graphisme ça n'es pas très poussé. Quand un tueur blesse ou tue un survivant le graphisme du survivant ne bouge, contrairement à Friday the 13th, ce qui est très appréciable quand on fini un survivant :)

Le gros point négatif mais qui est en attente de devenir positif (été 2019) est d'avoir des serveurs dédiés (pour le moment ce sont les tueurs qui host), ce qui permettra de régler certains lags, ou même des fois (souvent même) des déconnections de joueurs en pleine partie, ce qui pénalise énormément le reste de la partie.

Au niveau des dlc, il est vrai que ça peut devenir cher si vous vous mettez à acheter tous les dlc de la liste. Alors je vous recommande de n'acheter au début un, voir deux dlc payant qui vous intéresse le plus (avec le contenu de base), tout ça réunis devrais pouvoir vous permettre de vous familiariser avec le jeu, et obtenir la monnaie suffisante pour débloquer les autres dlc "gratuitement" (grosses séances de farm requises.)

Best game ever. I own in on all platforms.
You're either a killer or a survivor.
As the Killer you are hunting survivors placing them on hooks and using your killers unique perks to track and kill.
As the Survivors you are trying to keep away from the killer you hide in closets, throw down pallets, and fix generators to open the door for the final escape, if the rest of your team is defeated you will need to use the trap door.

10/10

Friday the 13th was the first game that came to consoles that was like this. 
This is 4 survivors vs 1 killer. 
To survive you must activate 5 generators which will power the controls to an escape door. The killer must hunt down and sacrifice as many of the survivors as they can and prevent their escape.
This is an Independent Game. It's not from an established studio. But it's still excellent. 
- You choose if you play as a Survivor or Killer. 
- Matchmaking is very good right now. If you pick Survivor or Killer you will get a game quickly. 
- If the Killer quits because he's doing poorly, the Survivors all get an XP reward. 
- If you get killed as a Survivor you can quit the match, get your XP and nobody is penalised. The match carries on for everyone else and you are free to start a new one. 
- The game rewards cooperation and this encourages survivors to help each other so most of the time they do. 
- You're going to suck as a level 1 Survivor and probably struggle as a level 1 Killer. Manage your expectations. Learn to play. It doesn't take too long to get the hang of it and once you realise this then the game is more fun and you can be encouraged by progression. 
- There are many Audio Cues to things that are happening in game. A decent Gaming Headset will really compliment this game. 
Graphically the game is fine. Some games look better and that's because they've got the same budget as a Hollywood Blockbuster. The graphics do the job fine for this game. 
Audio for this game is exceptional. Audio cues make a Gaming Headset a huge advantage. 
Gameplay seems very simple at first but as you continue you realise it's much more complex. The first few times you get a "Skill Check" while you're completing an action like fixing a Generator or Healing a colleague you'll fail and think it's ridiculous. But eventaully you'll recognise the Audio Cue for the Skill Check and because you're prepared you'll usually hit it easily. 
Expect to get murdered early on and have fun with abandon. As you become more experienced with the game you'll find success with both Survivors and Killers alike. 
Great game.
Игра замечательна особенно с друзьями

Dead By Daylight is one of a kind. Addicting once you get a handle on the controls, and an understanding of how the game works. It is very unforgiving though, once you die that's it. You loose all the item's you were carrying and any item's you may have picked up while wandering through the map looking for generators. It actually makes it suspenseful, when you know the killer has seen you and you gotta find a way to escape him, if you don't thats it you loose it all. It can be difficult at first due to some players having been playing it for months or even years, and trust me they gonna get you. A LOT! All and all i would die again and again. easily and 8 out 10. Maybe even a 9.

O jogo é bom e viciante, ainda mais jogando com amigos. O único real problema, é a falta de um servidor do próprio jogo, sendo que os jogadores tem a necessidade de hostear as partidas, e ocasionalmente aparecem (Maioria das vezes) partidas com Ping alto. Outra coisa que senti falta, foi um sistema de formador de equipes. Quando chamo meus amigos para jogar e a partida acaba, todos voltamos ao Lobby individualmente, tendo que novamente chama-los. Se houvesse um sistema de jogar novamente, ou todos voltassem ao Lobby juntos, seria bom.

Over 400 hours of playtime, id say this game is worth investing in if you don't mind:
Toxic people 
Buggs 
Alot of timese where you go "HOW DID THAT HIT ME?" or "HOW DID THAT HIT?"

I've met alot of good and amazing people throught this game, i've laughed my ass of, i have also been close to smash my keyboard in tiny plastic peices. 

The game is a grind for sure, you can unlock every single perk in the game with just enough playtime. 

I would recomend you if you feel like you're gonna stick around to buy atleast some DLC's where you can unlock good perks faster. 

The Dev's are somewhat talking with their players, this summer they will have dedicated servers instead of having the killers hosting games that could mean if you are really unlucky a killer will first have decent ping then suddenly you just teleport around the map and the killer can easly get to you. 

There is a decent amount of mechanichal skills and pure knowledge to make you a god at this game both from a Survor and Killer perspective. 

There is some good contetcreators for Dead by Daylight:

Youtubers (who also stream)

Monto: Perkbuilds and shenanigans.
Noob3: Just pure shenanigans and "funny moments".
HybridPanda: Perkbuilds and guides.
Ussylis: Mechanical Guides. 

Streamers:
MorfUK

ANGRYPUG
